body:
I've checked this with gcc on ubuntu 16.04, which ships binutils 2.26 by
default, using spack's binutils 2.36. Only the combination +gas and ~ld
seems to trigger this incompatibilty with debug symbols (gcc -g -O2
main.c fails with the error in the comment above the conflict)

Binutils concretizes with the old concretizer again.

Closes #23112
title: Drop overly strict conflicts for assembler/linker
